title: Make League Of Legends Great Again
body: I believe that by reverting EVERYTHING that has happened in league (apart from the smexy new map change) back to Season 3 the game will be more enjoyable for everyone.. #MakeLoLGreatAgain

replies.body: you say make it great again. kinda hard when it was never great in the first place.
So revert from a damage meta season to another damage meta season? I'm so in!
I say go back to before season 1.
